div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xx die februarij quo Supra

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the aldirman
and consal that the baxtaris sal baik ij penny breid' of gude
franche flour' cleyne weilboutit weing' xxxij vncez
and of Scottis quhet siclik that be gude and Sufficient Stuf
and penny breid' contening xvj vncez and quha that bakis
breid' and kepis nocht the pace salbe pvnist be Rigour'
of law and the breid' salbe eschetis Ande gif ony bakis
myxt Stuf salbe Secludit the craft and pvnist be Rigouris
of law

The saide day thomas chapman grantit him aving
to Williame blinsele yongar xij markis and askit ane
lauchful day that he mycht ger' get the man befor
the balyeis that suld' Releyve him Ande the balyeis
chargit the saide thomas to pay the saide Some
within terme of law

The saide day Robert crag one that ane part Ande
Jonhne Ramsay hatmakar one that vthir part oblist tham
be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand at the ordinance and
deliuerance of the aldirman and the consale anent the debatis
betuix thame quhilkis riplie auisit the Richtis of batht
the saide partiis herd seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit and ordanit
the saide Jonhne to Cum One Sonday that next cumis in
tyme of the hie mes' in the queir' bringand with him ane
Candil of j li' of wax and ask the said Robertis forgivnes
for the Offence done to him and Offir' the said Candil to
the halie blud' licht And gif euir he committis ony offence
to the said Robertis or tile ony vthir siclik nichbouris of this
burghe and beis conuikit tharintill he sal pay fourtj schillingis
to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem antepenultimo
die mensis februarij anno quo Supra

The saide day sere Johne ruthirfurd' aldirman of Abirdene follouit
Jonhne Scheuall franchman Induellar of Deip for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of iiij barrelis of Salmond' and j frank as he that come
Souerte to him for Jonhne Eleyotis for pament of the saide gudis
quhilkis the saide Jonhne scheval denyit Ande in continent the saide
action' with consent of bath the saide partiis was put to the decision'
of an assis' of the best and worthiest vnsuspect burges of the
said' burghe quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aithez suorne the Richtis
resonnis and allegacionis of bath the said partiis herde seyne and vndir
standin deliuerit and ordanit be the moutht of Alexander Rede forspekar
of the saide assis' that the saide Jonhne schevall sal mak pament
to the aldirman of the waill of thre barrellis of Salmond' as thai
war' sauld' in the tone' of Deipe for Jonhne elyotis dett Ande
atour he sal fynde Sufficient Caucion and Souerte to the
saide aldirmane to keipe him Skathtles anent his Obliga
cion' bundin to Jonhne eleyot of fiwe markis

the saide day It was deliuerit and ordanit be Williame
Wricht and alexander Coupar that Williame Kintor sal deliuer the
ald' almary to James' of Kintor and tene s' of vsual
money of Scotland'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
die mensis marcij anno Domini quo Supra

The saide day thomas prat deliuerit ane Stane of wax
at commavnde of the aldirman balyeis and counsale to our Soueran
lordis propin price xviij s' et Sex li' of skocheatisskorcheatis price
xviiij s' quhilkis salbe allouit in his wattir maile

the saide day resauit fra Williame blinsell four' li of
slorcheatisskorcheatis price xij s' to the saide propin quhilkis salbe allouit
in his wattir maile

The saide day Resauit fra mathow branche thre stane wax'
to the saide propin price of the Stane xviij s' quhilkis
salbe allouit in this his wattir malys

The saide day Jonhne Colisone grantit him aving to Androw murray
eldar and Dauid murray his Sone xl s' to be pait within terme of law

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Williame
blinsel forspekar that megy hill Dauid Spens' Symsone and his
Spous' sal stande at the ordinance of four' personis anent
al debatis betuix tham quhilkis partiis oblist tham be the fathtis
of thar bodiis to stand' tharto Ande gif euere ony of tham
offendis tile vthiris sal pay xx s' to Sanct nicholes werk

The saide day Comperit Jonhne thomsone Alane litstar
and William nicholsone and Schew how thai hed' lent iij li'
of money to outreid' Sanct nicholes werk and askit
pament tharof and coud' gett nayne tharfor thai protestit for Remed'
of law

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij die
marcij anno quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne chamer was in ane amerciament of the Court be
ane Suorne assis' William blinsele forspekar' for the wranguis'
strubulance of Effy Doug Item the saide Jonhne was in ane amerciament
of the court for the strubulance of Eby Doug Item the saide John
for his wyf in amerciament of the court' for the strubulance of the saide
weman and for the amendis thai war' oblist be the fathtis of thar
bodiis to stande at the ordinance of the assis' quhilkis ordanit
the saide Jonhne to gif ij s' to the saide weman And gif euire
he or his saide wyf committis ony strubulance tile the saide weman
or tile ony vthir he sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk
vnforgevin

The saide day the aldirman balyeis continevit the action betuix
William Walcar' and Jonhne Stevin quhile f monunday that next
cumis in hoip of Concord in siclik strintht as it is now anent
the clame of aucht franche crovnis
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die marcij

Eodem die Alexander Rede deuenit plegius legalis quod Alexander gallouay erit
Indempnis pro thoma Wodman et Johannes thomsone deuenit plegius legalis
quod Idem thomas erit Indempnis pro dicto Alexandro aliter quam per viam Juris Et
quilibet ipsorum obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes et cetera

Curia Capitalis balliuorm burgi de abirdene tenta
In pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis aprilis anno Domini
et cetera Nonagesimo Septimo quo die sectis vocatis
et Curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die plegium porrectum alias per Willelmum goldsmith
super thomam mar' continuantur vsque in feriam Sextam proximo futuro
et Idem thomas premunitus fuit ad comparendum eidem responsurus

The saide day Jonhne Stevin grantit him avand' to
William Walcar yongar aucht franche crovnis to be pait
be mydsommir the fest of Sanct Jonhne the baptist next
hereftir for tua barrellis of Salmond' and j barrel of girls'
Ande anent thre frankis debatabile betuix tame thai
ar' oblist tile stand at the ordinance of Androw elphin
stone and Robert blinsell be the fathtis of thar bodiis

Eodem die Andreas skot alias scottis Androw amerciatur per assisam
pro perturbio mariote tempilman ex ore andree branche
prelocutoris assise Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et dabit
duos s' dicte mulierj antequam accedat de pretorio Et si
In postrum dictam mariotam aut Richardum litstar seu aliquam
aliam personam perturbauerit et Inde conuictus fuerit soluet xxtj s'
fabrice ecclesie sine remissione

the saide day William Walcar' in Drvm protestit Solemptlie to be
fre of the clame of William Wobstar vnto the tyme he be persevit
be new Soit and persecucion becaus' he gert warne him and come
nocht to persew him

The said' day Elene clat wyf to Dauid galichtlie was in ane
amerciament of the court for the stribulance of Williame gray and to
amend' as law will forbeir' in tyme to Cum be ane Suorne
assis' Androu branche forspekar of the said' assis' And forthir for
the said' offence It was deliuerit that gif euir the said' Elene Inquietis or
trubulis the said' William or ony vthir in tyme to Cum scho salbe put
in the goyf and scho be conuikit tharof

The saide day Alexander skrogis grantit to releyve thomas chapman anent
aucht to William blinsele for the mariagis gudis acht
to him for the marage of the said' Alexandris douchtir

The saide day thomas mar' assignit to sere Williame Crukschank
chaplane of Sanct Duthacis altar Sevin Schillingis and vj d' of his
malys of this next Witsonday terme of his lande liande in the gallowgat
betuix the landis of thomas prat one the northt' and Jhon myl on the southt Ande frathinfurtht yerlie
fiwe Schillingis to be Rasit of the malys of his saide lande at his
avne handis at twa vsuale termes in the yer' mertymes in winter ande
Witsonday be evinly proporcionis for the ourgevin of the proces' leide
be the saide chaplane of ane wast lande pertening to the saide thomas
quhilkis assignacion the saide thomas oblist him and his ayris be the fathtis
of his bodie tile keipe and defende to the saide chaplan ay and to the tyme
the saide wast lande be maid' Strenyeabile for the saide annuele
Rente of the quhilkis the saide sere William askit act and Instrument befor thomas
prat alexander chamer yongar androw branche mastiris Alexander fyf Alexander massy
and Alexander bysset William Wormet and mathow branche

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per magistrum laurencium piot Capellanum
ac procuratorem altaris Sancti Andree apostoli infra ecclesiam per cathedralem Abirdonensis
deduct' de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis Cuiusdam terre
vaste Jacente infra dictum burgum in le hukstarraw inter terram Roberti
evinsone ex orientali ex vna et terram Willelmi nicholsone ex occidentali
partibus ab altera et terram domini Andree henrici versus boriam et terra
Communionem viam regiam versus austrum in defectu solucionis vnius annuj
redditus duarum marcarum sibi et dicto altarj a longo tempore debit' et non
solut' vnde dictus magister laurencius per suum procuratorem et prelocutorem dominum matheum
nicholsone peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et
Justicie Complementum Et porrexit plegium in manibus andree nachtj
seriandi quod ipse procuratorio nomine dicti altaris quo supra proprietatem et possessionem
dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus
Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio datum
fuit teste Cua' Curia ac thoma prat alexandro chamer Juniore patricio leslie Willelmo
Worme Alexandro mathesone

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes Kynnynmond' Capellanus
ac procurator altaris beate Katherine virginis infra ecclesiam cathedralem situati et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xxxtj denariorum sibi
et dicto altarj annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente ex occidentali parte
vie regie qua Itur ad le bolbrig inter terram martinj Kemp ex
australi et Croftum form' domus predicatorum huius burgi ex boreali partibus ab
altera ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio
die huius processus testibus Donaldo litstar' Johanne sadlar' et andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus blinsel procurator magistri themannj crab et
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu si xl d' sibi annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram olim
thome Waus ex orientali et terram quondam henrici tulidef ex occidentali ad quam accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia
tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus Donaldo litstar Johanne sadlar' et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram frater Johannis huntar procuratorio nomine priorum et conuentus
domus predicatorum huius burgi et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu
vj s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie
ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram quondam thome Waus ex orientali et terram olim
patricij henrici tulidef ex occidentali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio
die huius processus testibus Donaldo litstar et Johanne sadlar' et andrea nachtj seriando

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
Septimo die aprilis anno quo Supra

Eodem die dominus nicholaius Sclugy fecit constituit et ordinavit
gilbertum hay de Delgate dominum Johannem blak et patricium Rede
coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad petendum et recipiendum
a Johanne Cullane Sex li' et vndecim s' grossorum monete
flandrie et de receptis acquitand' Et si necesse summonivit prosequend'
agend' defendend' respondend' et obiciend'm in vberiore forma procuratorij promit
ten' de Rato et grato cum Ceteris clausulis necessariis et
Oportunis

The saide day William goldsmitht dischargist the assis' of
the decisione of the borghe' strekit be him one thomas
mar' anent thre li' gretis allegeand' he walde tak
ane letter of Cursing' tharapone

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Williame
blinsel forspekar that ellene of buchane has set to thome
ridaill the lande the now Inhabitis for tuentj s' of male
in the yer' say lang as plesis hom to Sytt
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xo die aprilis

The saide day James Crak grantit to pay aucht schillingis
to Jonhne of retre for the maile of ane berne gif Robert
blinsele wald' nocht pay It
